title: Remote Simulation-Based Clinical Competency Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and patient management concepts
context.additional_context: Science field education for office/administrative professionals. Conducted in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment, with summative assessment-driven operations

learning_goals: Learners can perform severe patient management scenarios in remote simulation environments with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can analyze clinical decision-making processes at least three times and propose improvements through non-face-to-face debriefing sessions.
Learners can apply more than ten core clinical skills using high-fidelity simulators and video conferencing platforms.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
